reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress's style, particularly its sexy scoop in the back, and appreciate its firm fit and good stretch. The dress receives positive feedback for its quality, comfort, and thickness, with one customer noting it's great for work and going out. They like its color, with one describing it as a bright cheery yellow. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great!
items.body: This dress is super cute and comfortable! Easy to dress up for a wedding or just for a night out! Fits true to size and the fabric is good quality, thick and stretchy, not too thick but not see through. Great winter dress! I liked it more than I expected! Read more
items.author: Crafty Wildflower

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfortable and cute
items.body: cute dress, love the bright cheery yellow the ruffle around the neckline, sleeve and the bottom make the dress very famine. this dress is comfortable wear , nice for a fall and early winter. this dress does have some stretch to it so if you gain a little winter weight you'll still be able to put this cute dress on. it's got some thickness to it for that little touch of warmth in the colder months as well. over all very happy with the dress and ordered a couple more in different colors. Read more
items.author: missy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So stylish
items.body: Absolutely my favorite dress. Love the fit and. Color wish we had more color options darker shades purple or blue or even a light purple a pretty med grey Read more
items.author: s bruner

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Must have very nice
items.body: I really like this dress. The quality is very satisfying for the price. It's thick, kinda heavy, stretches, fits warm and comfortable. It's nice for the fall. My husband really like the look. It's true to It's size and it stretches well so you can order you actual size. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Read more
items.author: Coco

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars But This Dress Right Now!!
items.body: Ladies! I LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress! I don't write reviews often but this one truly merited my thoughts. I ordered a medium in tbe wine/ox blood tone. This dress is a mix of stylish and elegant. I think it's flattering for most body types and if you have nice curves you deserve this dress. It says classy with out doing too much. As far as the feel, its a mix of warm and cozy without the feeling of bulkiness. I also have to mention the good stretch. I wore it to church and felt perfectly warm and comfortable on a gloomy rainy day. I'm style expert and I'm not too quick to buy fast fashion if it looks cheap or doesn't look flattering. The dress "As Is" honestly was just okay to me. But the "creative" vibe in me decided to tweek the dress until I discovered an instant elevation to this look. And now I LOVE this dress. If you're looking to level-up this dress from Amazon like to designer love....here's the recipe: 1. I removed ALL of the buttons. I don't care for non-functional buttons if I can help it. And to be honest it made the dress look cheap. 2. I turned the dress around. The seam where the buttons were has now created a sexy line down your back. Sort of reminiscent of panty hose with a seam down the back. Plus that faint line gives an optical illusion of an elongated silhouette. Also your neckline becomes more interesting because the frills frames your neck. And what was once the front now you have a sexy scoop in the back. 3. Steam the dress. I could have ironed it but I didn't want the risk of getting the "iron shine". If you know what I mean, there's no going back once you get the "iron shine". 4. Belt it. I love belts. Especially when I want to work it with a matching heel. I used my Versace belt with gold embellished "V" and black pumps with a gold zipper. This just might be my go-to for fall and winter. I'm so glad I took a chance on this dress. And now I plan on buying all of the colors!! Read more
items.author: Nicole V

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Love the quality and fit ! It’s perfect Read more
items.author: Maria Cherepanova

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress collar just made wrong
items.body: The material is good, the collar around the neck didn't lay properly and kept rolling up. If it weren't for that I would have kept it. True to fit. Read more
items.author: Cindy Heick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So pretty!
items.body: Seriously one of the cutest dresses I own! Very stretchy, I should have sized down but for the price and quality honestly this will not be my only one. The quality is great, super comfy, sizing seems true it's just thicker therefore heavier so it may have a bit of runching if you down smooth out. Otherwise very true to size. I think this is a great budget friendly dress and is VERY flattering. Read more
items.author: Courtney Butterfield

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, Pink, White, Blue, Yellow, Burgundy, Apricot, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
